Outerwear.name: Shearling Jacket in Brown
Outerwear.details: A classic silhouette, reimagined in an oversized fit. Crafted from a tumbled Brown leather and black shearling lining. Front zip pockets and heavyweight zip closure. Leather tape seam details.

Outerwear.name: Mohair Work Shirt in Red
Outerwear.details: A slightly oversized work shirt made from a British made plaid Mohair and fully lined. Featuring side pockets and a single chest pocket. Front zip closure and buttoned cuffs. Contrast faux leather spread collar.

Outerwear.name: Velour Jacket in Brown
Outerwear.details: Relaxed fitting collared bomber jacket in black velour. Lined in cupro with pantone matched wool ribbing. Custom RiRi hardware and zips.

Pants.name: Velour Pants in Brown
Pants.details: Brown velour sweatpants in a medium weight velvet jersey cotton blend. Pantone matched Rib to the hem & cuffs with a silver oxidised Cobrax cord adjuster to the hood. RiRi zips to the pockets.

Pants.name: Velour Pants in Black
Pants.details: Black velour sweatpants in a medium weight velvet jersey cotton blend. Pantone matched Rib to the hem & cuffs with a silver oxidised Cobrax cord adjuster to the hood. RiRi zips to the pockets.

Pants.name: Military Pants in Black
Pants.details: A straight leg cargo pant in garment dye vintage black cotton. Cargo pockets on the side and zip pockets to the front. Elasticated drawstring waist and adjustable hem.

Shoes.name: Sneakers in Brown
Shoes.details: The Terrier. A lightweight, hand-made sneaker crafted for the everyday wearer. Featuring a chunky sock insert, breathable membrane with a matte body cage. Sitting on a sloping Vibram sole unit, elements of the brand DNA include contrasting 3M reflective touches, matte black piping and hiking laces threaded through a rubber dipped R bar. A carbon bubble

Shoes.name: Low Sneakers in Taupe
Shoes.details: A luxury everyday sneaker featuring a bonded Nylon upper and contrasting translucent rubber sole. Finished with a Cobrax breathable eyelet and Represent embossed metal bar to the tongue.

Shoes.name: Raptor Sneakers in Brown
Shoes.details: The Raptor Sneaker. A mid-top basketball inspired luxury sneaker crafted for everyday wear. Featuring ‘REP’ within the panel work to the outer and inner of the upper, made from tough Italian calf-skin
